overview: Every Saturday in his studio Yuri Norshtein signs books, talks to readers and viewers. The audience has a rare opportunity to overhear what the genius of today, the famous cartoonist, is talking about in the kitchen of his studio, under a cozy yellow lampshade. Poems, folk art and the secret of the subtle matter of talent, which can be felt in the magical chime of bells ...
title: Once Upon a Time With Yuriy Norstein
